☀️ Summer Essentials, Sorted ☀️
Your skin deserves sunshine — paired with protection and a golden glow ✨

Two heroes we’re never without this season:

🌿 Climate Defence Facial Cream – your daily shield against sun, pollution + dehydration.
This untinted SPF 30 face cream offers broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection, powered by:
• Lingonberry Stem Cells – rich in polyphenols to defend against sun-induced damage
• Prickly Pear Extract – vitamin-rich and clinically proven to boost hydration by 17.5%
• Hyaluronic Acid – deeply hydrates and plumps for a firmer appearance

🌞 Sunless Glow 3-in-1 Tan – your golden glow in a bottle.
This enhanced natural + organic gradual tan formula delivers:
• Gradual Self-Tan – with raspberry-derived Erythrulose + low-level stabilised DHA (3%)
• Pre-Tan Accelerator & Post-Tan Extender – Carob Fruit Extract boosts melanin + reduces tan fading by 62.5%
• Deep Nourishment – Shea Butter + Hyaluronic Acid lock in moisture for soft, smooth, sun-kissed skin

Available NOW via our website 🌿
